channel.title: Comments on: Mathematics or dreams, which is more real? Izibalo okanye amaphupha, yeyiphi eyona iyinyani?

item.title: By: Sara (Nox)
item.dc:creator: Sara (Nox)
item.description:
Nyani sisi!! Ubhale kakuhle ngesiXhosa nesiNgesi!
Ukuthetha 'intangible': isichazi-magama yaseOxford sithi "into engenakuchukunyiswa" kodwa andivumi nale nkcazelo, kuba ithi asikwazi kuyicinga le nto. Uthe (ngokunyanisa) zonke izibalo namaphupha zizinto zengqondo.
Yingcinga endisokolisayo kudala ndabafundisa abafundi bam izibalo: izibalo yinto abangakwazi kuyiphatha bangayibone, bangayiva ngezivo. Ucinga ntoni na sicacise kakuhle laa ngcinga esikolweni?
item.content:encoded:
Nyani sisi!! Ubhale kakuhle ngesiXhosa nesiNgesi!

Ukuthetha ‘intangible’: isichazi-magama yaseOxford sithi “into engenakuchukunyiswa” kodwa andivumi nale nkcazelo, kuba ithi asikwazi kuyicinga le nto. Uthe (ngokunyanisa) zonke izibalo namaphupha zizinto zengqondo.

Yingcinga endisokolisayo kudala ndabafundisa abafundi bam izibalo: izibalo yinto abangakwazi kuyiphatha bangayibone, bangayiva ngezivo. Ucinga ntoni na sicacise kakuhle laa ngcinga esikolweni?
